tool_description: Evaluates and scores the organization's negotiation position strength based on financial capacity, market conditions, and strategic factors.

market_position.description: Market position: leader, competitor, challenger, follower

labor_market_tightness.description: Labor market conditions: tight, balanced, loose

union_strength.description: Union bargaining strength: strong, moderate, weak

recent_performance.description: Recent organization performance: excellent, good, average, poor

competitive_pressure.description: Competitive pressure level: high, medium, low

error_messages: Invalid financial score: Financial health score must be between 1 and 10.
Invalid market position: Market position must be one of: leader, competitor, challenger, follower.
Invalid labor market: Labor market tightness must be one of: tight, balanced, loose.
Invalid union strength: Union strength must be one of: strong, moderate, weak.
Empty benchmarks: Industry benchmarks array cannot be empty.
Invalid performance rating: Recent performance must be one of: excellent, good, average, poor.
Invalid pressure level: Competitive pressure must be one of: high, medium, low.
usage: Provide financial_health_score, market_position, labor_market_tightness, union_strength, and industry_benchmarks. Optionally add strategic_priorities, recent_performance, and competitive_pressure for comprehensive position assessment.

weakness_factors.description: Factors that may weaken negotiation position

position_category.description: Overall position category: strong, moderate, weak
